ygData.subject: Re: 9th Level Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: That s horrible.  Why can t they just give us 4 mana to start?  It s like teasing us.  We wait for level 9, thinking, I m sooooo close to that pet, then we get
ygData.messageBody:
That's horrible. Why can't they just give us 4 mana to start? It's like teasing us. We wait for level 9, thinking, I'm sooooo close to that pet, then we get there and find the wait continues, but we have the burden of keeping the spells while waiting to use them. Those B@$t@rd$!! I bet they killed Kenny even!

Kakarot, Innoruuk


> ** Original Subject: [shadowknight] Re: 9th Level Pet
> ** Original Sender: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
> ** Original Date: Mon, 3 May 1999 16:43:18 -0500 (CDT)

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
>
>
> When I got level 9 I found that I couldn't cast both Leering corpse and
> Invisibility to Undead. I have also heard that some people have had to
> wait until Level 11 to cast them. You are not alone...
>
> Oogog
>
>
